Burnout 3: Takedown is a racing game developed by Criterion Games and published by EA Games for PlayStation 2 and Xbox . Is the third title in the franchise , preserves some features and adds others in relation to its predecessor , Burnout 2. This game has a differential when compared to other racing games by having categories other than traditional Circuit.
One of the great advantages is the game EA Trax : first , Burnout has a soundtrack of pop rock , which blends perfectly with the game.
